did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.abstract: Letter from Senator Tom Connally, then chair of the United States Senate Committee on Foreign Relations, to G.V. Brindley of Temple, Texas. Regarding the case of a missing serviceman, Lieutenant Lloyd L. Withers.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: A native of McLennan County, Texas, Thomas Terry Connally (1877-1963) served in the United States Congress from 1917-1952.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Single-page typescript letter from Senator Tom Connally, then chair of the United States Senate Committee on Foreign Relations, to G.V. Brindley of Temple, Texas. Regarding the case of a missing serviceman, Lieutenant Lloyd L. Withers.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Tom Connally Letter, 1944, Courtesy of Special Collections, University of Houston Libraries
